name: Add Contributor
author: Joe Boydston

sections.description:
Used to allow admin and editor user role to create contributor role’d users

sections.installation:
Copy “admin-author-filter” folder to your WordPress Plugins Directory.
Activate plugin via WordPress settings.
sections.changelog:
1.4

Verified compatibility with WP 4.0

1.3

Verified compatibility with WP 3.9.1

1.2

Split user name into first and last name fields
Added nick name field.

1.1.1

Added check before referencing ‘page’ in _GET array

1.1

Fixed JS calls

1.0

Initial Version
